text: (aur ai rasool vah vakt bhee yaad dilao) jab khuda ne paigambaron se iqaraar liya ki ham tumako jo kuchh kitaab aur hikamat (vagairah) de usake baad tumhaare paas koee rasool aae aur jo kitaab tumhaare paas usakee tasadeeq kare to (dekho) tum zaroor us par eemaan laana, aur zaroor usakee madad karana (aur) khuda ne faramaaya kya tumane iqaraar liya tumane mere (ehad ka) bojh utha liya sabane arz kee hamane iqaraar kiya irashaad hua (achchha) to aaj ke qaul va (qaraar ke) aapas mein ek doosare ke gavaah rahana
